name: Zombie Apocalypse (itch) (Camas High School Games)
description: Do you want a first hand experience in eliminating the zombie population? Then you MUST buy the one and only Zombie Apocalypse game! In this game you will experience eliminating zombies and earning coins for your success in killing zombies. Not only will you gain coins for upgrades, you will go up in waves as you get better and better. Good luck saving the world Soldier!
